repository.description: Information about the repository where the comment was made

url.description: The URL of the API resource for the comment

pull_request_review_id.description: The ID of the pull request review to which the comment belongs

id.description: The unique identifier of the comment

node_id.description: The unique identifier for the comment node

diff_hunk.description: A snippet of the diff where the comment was made

path.description: The file path where the comment was made

position.description: The position of the comment relative to the diff

original_position.description: The original position of the comment relative to the diff

commit_id.description: The ID of the commit the comment is associated with

original_commit_id.description: The original commit ID associated with the comment

in_reply_to_id.description: The ID of the comment being replied to

user.description: Information about the user who made the comment

created_at.description: The timestamp when the comment was created

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the comment was last updated

html_url.description: The URL for viewing the comment on GitHub

pull_request_url.description: The URL of the pull request to which the comment belongs

author_association.description: The association of the author of the comment with the repository

_links.description: Contains links to related resources for the review comment

self.description: URL for the review comment itself

href.description: The URL of the comment itself

html.description: URL for the HTML representation of the review comment

href.description: The URL for viewing the comment in a browser

pull_request.description: URL for the pull request associated with the review comment

href.description: The URL for the associated pull request

start_line.description: The starting line of the comment reference

original_start_line.description: The original starting line of the comment reference

start_side.description: The side in the diff where the comment reference started

line.description: The line in the diff where the comment was made

original_line.description: The original line for the comment reference

side.description: The side of the diff where the comment was made (e.g., left or right)

subject_type.description: The type of subject the comment is associated with

reactions.description: Reactions to the comment (e.g., thumbs up, thumbs down)
